sentences.text: NOTICE OF ANNUAL MEETING OF STOCKHOLDERS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To Be Held On May 9, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To the Stockholders of NEWELL BRANDS INC.:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You are cordially invited to attend the annual meeting of stockholders of NEWELL BRANDS INC. (the Company) to be held on Tuesday, May 9, 2017, at 9:00 a.m., local time at the W Hotel Hoboken, 225 River Street, Hoboken, New Jersey 07030.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the annual meeting, you will be asked to:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Elect twelve directors of the Company nominated by the Board of Directors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ratify the appointment of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP as the Companys independent registered public accounting firm for the year 2017;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Vote on an advisory resolution to approve executive compensation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Vote on an advisory resolution on the frequency of the advisory vote on executive compensation; an
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Transact such other business as may properly come before the annual meeting and any adjournment or postponement of the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Only stockholders of record at the close of business on March 17, 2017 may vote at the annual meeting or any adjournment or postponement thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whether or not you plan to attend the annual meeting, please act promptly to vote your shares with respect to the proposals described above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote your shares by marking, signing and dating the enclosed proxy card and returning it in the postage-paid envelope provided.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You also may vote your shares by telephone or through the Internet by following the instructions set forth on the proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you attend the annual meeting, you may vote your shares in person, even if you have previously submitted a proxy in writing, by telephone or through the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By Order of the Board of Directors,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Bradford R. Turner Chief Legal Officer & Corporate Secretary
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: March 30, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: mportant Notice Regarding the Availability of Proxy Materials for the Stockholder Meeting to Be Held on May 9, 2017the Companys Proxy Statement and 2016 Annual Report to Stockholders are available at WWW.PROXYVOTE.COM

sentences.text: PROXY STATEMENT FOR ANNUAL MEETING OF STOCKHOLDERS TO BE HELD ON MAY 9, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ou are receiving this Proxy Statement and proxy card from us because you own shares of common stock of Newell Brands Inc. (the Company tatement describes the items on which the Company would like you to vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It also gives you information so that you can make an informed voti n.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company first mailed this Proxy Statement and the proxy card to stockholders on or about March 30, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: DATE, TIME AND PLACE OF THE ANNUAL MEETING
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company will hold the annual meeting at the W Hotel Hoboken, 225 River Street, Hoboken, New Jersey 07030, at 9:00 a.m., local time, on Tuesday, May 9, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: QUESTIONS AND ANSWERS ABOUT OTING AT THE ANNUAL MEETING AND RELATED MATTER
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who is entitled to vote at the annual meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Record holders of the Companys common stock at the close of business on March 17, 2017 are entitled to notice of and to vote at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On the record date, approximately 483,089,929 shares of common stock were issued and eligible to vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What constitutes a quorum for the annual meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A quorum of stockholders is necessary to take action at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A majority of the outstanding shares of common stock of the Company, present in person or by proxy, will constitute a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Votes cast in person or by proxy at the annual meeting will be tabulated by the inspectors of election appointed for the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The inspectors of election will determine whether a quorum is present at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The inspectors of election will treat instructions to withhold authority, abstentions and broker non-votes as present for purposes of determining the presence of a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event that a quorum is not present at the annual meeting, the Company expects that the annual meeting will be adjourned to solicit additional proxies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How are votes counted?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You are entitled to one vote for each share you own on the record date on the election of directors and each proposal to be considered at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your common stock is held in street name (i.e., in the name of a bank, broker or other record holder), you will need to instruct your broker or bank regarding how to vote your common stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) rules, your broker or bank does not have discretion to vote your common stock without your instructions regarding the election of directors, the advisory vote on executive compensation and the advisory vote on the frequency of the advisory vote on executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you do not provide your broker or bank with voting instructions regarding these proposals, your shares of common stock will not be considered present at the annual meeting of stockholders for purposes of voting on these proposals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, please note that banks and brokers that have not received voting instructions from their clients may vote their clients shares on the ratification of the appointment of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How many votes are required to elect a director or approve a proposal?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Election of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors receiving a majority of votes cast with respect to that directors election (number of shares voted for a director must exceed the number of votes cast against that director) will be elected as a director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares not present, shares not voting and shares voting abstain will have no effect on the election of directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ratification of the appointment of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP, Approval of Executive Compensation and Approval of any Other Proposals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The vote required for the ratification of the appointment of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP, the approval of executive compensation in the advisory vote and the approval of any other proposal that may properly come before the annual meeting or any adjournment or postponement of the meeting, except the proposal regarding the frequency of the advisory vote on executive compensation, is the affirmative vote of a majority of the shares of common stock present in person or by proxy and entitled to vote at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to any such proposal, you may vote in favor of or against the item or you may abstain from voting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any proxy marked abstain with respect to such proposal will have the effect of a vote against the proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Frequency of Executive Compensation Vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to the advisory vote on the frequency of the advisory vote on executive compensation, you may vote for a frequency of every one, two or three years or you may abstain from voting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The option that receives a plurality (the greatest number of votes cast) by the stockholders will be considered the option approved by the stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares not present, shares not voting and shares voting abstain with respect to this proposal will have no effect on the advisory vote on the frequency of the executive compensation vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How do I vote my shares?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may attend the annual meeting and vote your shares in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You also may choose to submit your proxies by any of the following methods:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Voting by Mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you choose to vote by mail, simply complete the enclosed proxy card, date and sign it, and return it in the postage-paid envelope provided.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your shares will be voted in accordance with the instructions on your proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you sign your proxy card and return it without marking any voting instructions, your shares will be voted FOR the election of all director nominees, FOR the ratification of the appointment of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP, FOR the advisory resolution to approve executive compensation, FOR ONE YEAR as the frequency of the advisory vote to approve executive compensation and in the discretion of the persons named as proxies on all other matters that may properly come before the annual meeting or any adjournment or postponement of the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Voting by Telephone.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote your shares by telephone by calling the toll-free telephone number provided on your proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Telephone voting is available 24 hours a day, and the procedures are designed to authenticate votes cast by using a personal identification number located on your proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The procedures permit you to give a proxy to vote your shares and to confirm that your instructions have been properly recorded.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you vote by telephone, you should not return your proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Voting by Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You also may vote through the Internet by signing on to the website identified on your proxy card and following the procedures described on the website.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Internet voting is available 24 hours a day, and the procedures are designed to authenticate votes cast by using a personal identification number located on your proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The procedures permit you to give a proxy to vote your shares and to confirm that your instructions have been properly recorded.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you vote by Internet, you should not return your proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a stockholder whose shares are held in street name, you must either direct the record holder of your shares how to vote your shares or obtain  proxy, executed in your favor, from the record holder to be able to vote at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This Proxy Statement is also being used to solicit voting instructions for the shares of the Companys common stock held by the trustee of the Newell Rubbermaid 401(k) Savings and Retirement Plan for the benefit of plan participants.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Participants in this plan have the right to direct the
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: trustee regarding how to vote the shares of Company stock credited to their accounts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Unless otherwise required by law, the shares credited to each participants account will be voted as directed.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Participants in this plan may direct the trustee by telephone, through the Internet or by completing and returning a voting card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If valid instructions are not received from a Newell Rubbermaid 401(k) Savings and Retirement Plan participant by 11:59 Eastern Daylight Time on May 8, 2017, a participants shares will be voted proportionately by the trustee in the same manner in which the trustee votes all shares for which it has received valid instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How may I revoke or change my vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may revoke your proxy at any time before it is voted at the annual meeting by any of the following methods
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Submitting a later-dated proxy by mail, over the telephone or through the Internet
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sending a written notice, including by facsimile, to the Corporate Secretary of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You must send any written notice of a revocation of a proxy so that it is received before the taking of the vote at the annual meeting to:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Newell Brands Inc. 221 River Street Hoboken, New Jersey 07030 Facsimile: 1-815-266-0447 Attention: Corporate Secretary
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Attending the annual meeting and voting in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your attendance at the annual meeting will not in and of itself revoke your proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You must also vote your shares at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are held in street name by a bank, broker or other record holder, you must obtain a proxy, executed in your favor, from the record holder to be able to vote at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you require assistance in changing or revoking your proxy, please contact the Companys proxy solicitor at the following address or telephone number
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Morrow Soldali LLC 470 West Avenue Stamford, CT 06902 Phone Number: 1-800-662-5200
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who will count the votes?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Representatives from Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc. will tabulate the votes and act as an independent inspector of election for the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Where can I find the voting results of the annual meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company will include the voting results of the annual meeting in a Current Report on Form 8-K, which will be filed with the Securities and Exchange ommission (SEC) not later than May 15, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who will pay the costs of solicitation of proxies?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This Proxy Statement and the accompanying proxy card are being furnished to stockholders in connection with the solicitation of proxies by the Board of irectors of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company will pay the costs of soliciting proxies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who is the Companys proxy solicitor?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company has retained Morrow Soldali LLC to aid in the solicitation of proxies and to verify certain records related to the solicitation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company wi pay Morrow Soldali LLC a fee of $11,500 as compensation for its services and will reimburse it for its reasonable out-of-pocket expenses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to solicitation by mail, directors, officers and employees of the Company, at no additional compensation, may solicit proxies from stockholders by telephone, facsimile, Internet or in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: request, the Company will also reimburse brokerage houses and other custodians, nominees and fiduciaries for their reasonable expenses in sending the proxy materials to beneficial owners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How do I submit a stockholder proposal for the 2018 annual meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To be considered for inclusion in next years proxy materials, stockholder proposals to be presented at the Companys 2018 annual meeting of stockholders must be in writing and be received by the Company no later than November 30, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the 2018 annual meeting, the Companys management will be able to vote proxies in its discretion on any proposal not included in the Companys proxy statement for such meeting if the Company does not receive notice of the proposal on or before February 8, 2018.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a stockholder does not submit a proposal for inclusion in next years proxy statement, but instead wishes to present it directly at the 2018 annual meeting, the Companys By-Laws require that the stockholder notify the Company of such proposal in writing no later than 90 days prior to the anniversary date of the 2017 annual meeting, or February 8, 2018.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The stockholder must also comply with the requirements of Section 2.12 of the Companys By-Laws with respect to stockholder proposals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How do I nominate a candidate for election as a director at the 2018 annual meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any stockholder wishing to nominate a candidate for election as a director at the Companys 2018 annual meeting must notify the Company in writing no later than February 8, 2018.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Such notice must include appropriate biographical information and otherwise comply with the requirements of the Companys Restated Certificate of Incorporation and By-Laws relating to stockholder nominations of directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the proxy access By-Law provision adopted by the Board in February 2016 allows qualifying stockholders to include their director nominees in the Companys proxy materials by giving notice in writing no later than February 8, 2018.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Such notice of a proxy access nomination must set forth certain information specified in the proxy access By-Law about each stockholder submitting a nomination and each person being nominated as a candidate for election as a director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How do I provide a notice of my intention to present proposals and director nominations at the 2018 annual meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notices of intention to present proposals and director nominations at the 2018 annual meeting or requests in connection therewith, including requests for copies of the relevant provisions of the Companys Restated Certificate of Incorporation or By-Laws relating to proposals and director nominations, should be addressed to Newell Brands Inc., 221 River Street, Hoboken, New Jersey 07030, Attention: Corporate Secretary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How can I obtain a copy of the Companys 2016 annual report on Form 10-K?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A copy of the Companys 2016 annual report on Form 10-K (including the financial statements and financial statement schedules), as filed with the SEC, may be obtained without charge upon written request to the office of the Corporate Secretary of the Company at 221 River Street, Hoboken, New Jersey 07030.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A copy of the Companys Form 10-K and other periodic filings also may be obtained under the SEC Filings link under the Investor Relations tab on the Companys website at www.newellbrands.com and from the SECs EDGAR database at www.sec.gov.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The information contained on, or accessible from, the Companys website is not incorporated by reference into this proxy statement or any other report or document the Company files with or furnishes to the SEC, and references to the Companys website are intended to be inactive textual references only.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Could other business be conducted at the annual meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors does not know of any business to be brought before the annual meeting other than the matters described in the notice of annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, if any other matters properly come before the annual meeting or any adjournment or postponement of the annual meeting, each person named in the accompanying proxy intends to vote the proxy in accordance with his judgment on such matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROPOSAL 1ELECTION OF DIRECTORS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors has selected the following twelve nominees recommended by the Nominating/Governance Committee for election to the Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The nominees will hold office from their election until the next annual meeting of stockholders, or until their successors are elected and qualified.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to the Companys Corporate Governance Guidelines, a director is subject to mandatory retirement at the annual meeting immediately following the attainment of age 75.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxies will be voted, unless otherwise indicated, FOR the election of the twelve nominees for director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of the nominees are currently serving as irectors of the Company and have consented to serve as directors if elected at this years annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company has no reason to believe that any of he nominees will be unable to serve as a director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, should any nominee be unable to serve if elected, the Board of Directors may reduce the number of irectors, or proxies may be voted for another person nominated as a substitute by the Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors unanimously recommends that you vote FOR the election of each nominee for director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ian G.H. Ashken, age 56, was the Co-Founder of Jarden Corporation and served as its Vice Chairman and President from 2014 to 2016 when Jarden Corporation was acquired by the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Ashken became Vice Chairman, Chief Financial Officer and Secretary of Jarden in 2001 and served as Secretary of Jarden until 2007 and Chief Financial Officer until 2014.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Ashken served as the Vice Chairman and/or Chief Financial Officer of three public companies, Benson Eyecare Corporation, Lumen Technologies, Inc. and Boll Inc. between 1992 and 2000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Ashken also serves as a director of Platform Specialty Products Corporation and Nomad Foods Ltd.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During the last five years, Mr. Ashken previously served as a director of Jarden Corporation, GLG Partners, Inc. and Phoenix Group Holdings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Thomas E. Clarke, age 65, has been President, Nike Innovation of Nike, Inc. since 2013.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Clarke joined Nike, Inc. in 1980.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He was appointed divisional Vice President in charge of marketing in 1987, corporate Vice President in 1989, General Manager in 1990, and he served as President and Chief Operating Officer from 1994 to 2000 and as President of New Business Ventures from 2001 to 2013.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Clarke previously held various positions with Nike, Inc., primarily in research, design, development and marketing.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Clarke also has previously served on the Board of Directors of Starwood, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Clarke has expertise in global brand management, marketing and product development as well as substantial experience in organizational development and knowledge of supply chain operations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Clarke also played an integral role in the globalization of Nike.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He also has substantial institutional knowledge regarding the Company, including its operations and industries, due to his longstanding service to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Kevin C. Conroy, age 56, joined Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer (MGM) in 2016 in the newly created position of President, Digital and New Platforms.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to joining MGM, he was Chief Strategy and Data Officer, and President, Digital and Enterprise Development, Univision Communications, Inc. from 2009 to 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From 2001 to 2009, he served in a variety of senior programming, product and marketing roles at AOL LLC, most recently as AOLs Executive Vice President of Global Products and Marketing.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From 1995 to 2001, Mr. Conroy served in a number of roles with Bertelsmann AG, including as Chief Marketing Officer & President, New Technology, BMG Entertainment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Conroy has significant
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Name and Background
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: global experience in advertising and media with particular expertise in the Internet and online and mobile media businesses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Conroy is also a director of Sothebys.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He has led large global efforts to build consumer websites and software applications and has managed a number of popular Internet brands, and has been at the center of the evolution of digital media from the ntroduction of the enhanced CD to HDTV to the mass adoption of the web and mobile platforms.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Scott S. Cowen, age 70, has been President Emeritus and Distinguished University Chair of Tulane University since 2014.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior thereto, he was President of Tulane University and Seymour S Goodman Memorial Professor of Business in Tulanes A.B. Freeman School of Business as well as Professor of Economics in the School of Liberal Arts since 1998.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From 1984 to 1998, Dr. Cowen served as Dean and Albert J. Weatherhead III Professor of Management, Weatherhead School of Management, Case Western Reserve University.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to his departure in 1998, Dr. Cowen had been associated with Case Western Reserve University in various capacities since 1976.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: INFORMATION REGARDING BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND COMMITTEES AND CORPORATE GOVERNANCE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: General
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The primary responsibility of the Board of Directors is to oversee the affairs of the Company for the benefit of the Companys stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To assist it in fulfilling its duties, the Board of Directors has delegated certain authority to the Audit Committee, the Finance Committee, the Organizational Development & Compensation Committee and the Nominating/Governance Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The duties and responsibilities of these standing committees are described below under Committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors has adopted the Newell Brands Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Corporate Governance Guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The purpose of these guidelines is to ensure that the Companys corporate governance practices enhance the Boards ability to discharge its duties on behalf of the Companys stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Guidelines are available under the Corporate Governance link under the Investor Relations tab on the Companys website at www.newellbrands.com and may be obtained in print without charge upon written request by any stockholder to the office of the Corporate Secretary of the Company at 221 River Street, Hoboken, New Jersey 07030.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Guidelines include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: a requirement that a majority of the Board will be independent directors, as defined under the applicable rules of the NYSE and any standards adopted by the Board of Directors from time to time;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: a requirement that all members of the Audit Committee, the Finance Committee, the Organizational Development & Compensation Committee and th Nominating/Governance Committee will be independent directors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: a requirement that a director submit his or her resignation to the Board for consideration in the event he or she is not elected by a majority of the votes cast in an uncontested election;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: mandatory director retirement at the annual meeting immediately following the attainment of age 75;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: regular executive sessions of non-management directors outside the presence of management at least four times a year, provided that if the non- management directors include one or more directors who are not independent directors under the applicable NYSE rules, the independent directors also will meet, outside the presence of management in executive session, at least once a year;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: annual review of the performance of the Board and the Chairman of the Board;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: regular review of management succession planning and annual performance reviews of the Chief Executive Officer (CEO); and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the authority of the Board to engage independent legal, financial, accounting and other advisors as it believes necessary or appropriate to assist it in the fulfillment of its responsibilities, without consulting with, or obtaining the advance approval of, any Company officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: n addition, over the past several years, the Board has taken the following actions with respect to the Companys corporate governan
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: terminated the Companys shareholder rights plan, or poison pill;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: implemented majority voting for directors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: recommended a proposal to eliminate supermajority voting requirements in the Companys charter documents which was approved by stockholders;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: adopted a clawback, or recoupment, policy with respect to the incentive compensation of executive officers;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: recommended a proposal to amend the Companys Restated Certificate of Incorporation to provide for the annual election of directors which was approved by stockholders;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: adopted changes to the Companys By-Laws to permit stockholders who own 15% or more of the Companys outstanding common stock, on an aggregate net long basis, to call a special meeting of stockholders; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: adopted a proxy access provision in the Companys By-Laws to permit stockholders who have owned 3% or more of the Companys outstanding common stock for at least three years to nominate up to 20% of directors up for election in any one year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The positions of Chairperson of the Board and CEO are usually held by different persons.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that this separation has served the Company well for many years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, the Board is free to change this at any time and in the manner it determines to be best for the Company under the then xisting circumstances.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Should the Chairperson position be held by the CEO, the Board will appoint a lead independent director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Independence
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to the Corporate Governance Guidelines, the Board of Directors undertook its annual review of director independence in February 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During his review, the Board of Directors considered whether or not each director has any material relationship with the Company (either directly or as a partner, shareholder or officer of an organization that has a relationship with the Company) and has otherwise complied with the requirements for independence under he applicable NYSE rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result of these reviews, the Board of Directors affirmatively determined that all of the Companys current directors are independent of the Company and its management within the meaning of the applicable NYSE rules and under the standards set forth in the Corporate Governance Guidelines, with the exception of Michael B. Polk, Ian G.H. Ashken and Martin E. Franklin.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Polk is not considered an independent director because of his employment as Chief Executive Officer of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Messrs. Ashken and Franklin are not considered independent because of their prior employment with Jarden Corporation as well as their advisory services agreement with the Company through Mariposa Associates, LLC (Mariposa), a company in which Mr. Franklin and Mr. Ashken are partners and equity owners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For additional information on the advisory services agreement see Certain Relationships and Related Transactions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Meetings
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Companys Board of Directors held six meetings during 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All directors attended at least 75% of the Board meetings and meetings of Board committees on which they served.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the Companys Corporate Governance Guidelines, each director is expected to attend the annual meeting of the Companys stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Only Messrs. Polk and Cowhig attended the 2016 annual meeting of stockholders as the meeting was held in conjunction with the Companys proposal to approve the issuance of shares of the Companys common stock to stockholders of Jarden Corporation pursuant to the Agreement and Plan of Merger between the Company and Jarden Corporation, dated as of December 13, 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Companys non-management directors held four meetings during 2016 separately in executive session without any members of management present.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Companys Corporate Governance Guidelines provide that the presiding director at each such session is the Chairman of the Board or lead director, or in his or her absence, the person the Chairman of the Board or lead director so appoints.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Chairman of the Board currently presides over executive sessions of the non-management directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Committees
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors has an Audit Committee, a Finance Committee, an Organizational Development & Compensation Committee and a Nominating/Governance Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee, whose Chair is Mr. Strobel and whose other current members are Mr. Todman and Mr. Viault, met 12 times during 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors has affirmatively determined that each current member of the committee is an independent director for purposes of the Audit Committee under the applicable SEC regulations, the applicable NYSE rules and the Companys Corporate Governance Guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Further, the Board of Directors has affirmatively determined that Mr. Strobel, Mr. Todman and Mr. Viault are qualified as an audit committee financial expert within the meaning of the applicable SEC regulations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee assists the Board of Directors in fulfilling its fiduciary obligations to oversee:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the integrity of the Companys financial statements;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the Companys compliance with legal and regulatory requirements;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the qualifications and independence of the Companys independent registered public accounting firm;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the performance of the Companys internal audit function and independent registered public accounting firm; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the Companys overall risk management profile and the Companys process for assessing significant business risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Audit Committee:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: is directly responsible for the appointment, compensation, retention and oversight of the work of the Companys independent registered public accounting firm;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: has established procedures for the receipt, retention and treatment of complaints regarding accounting, internal accounting controls and auditing matters, including procedures for confidential, anonymous submission by employees of concerns regarding questionable accounting or audit matters; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: has the authority to engage independent counsel and other advisors as it deems necessary to carry out its duties.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Finance Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Finance Committee is chaired by Dr. Cowen.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other current members are Dr. Clarke, Ms. LEsperance, Mr. Strobel and Mr. Viault.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Finance Committee met six times in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors has affirmatively determined that each member of the Finance Committee is an independent director within the meaning of the applicable NYSE rules and the Companys Corporate Governance Guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Finance Committee is principally responsible for:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: reviewing the Companys capital structure, including its dividend policy and stock repurchase programs;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: reviewing and recommending, as appropriate, acquisitions, divestitures, partnerships and other business combinations; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: reviewing the Companys tax planning and treasury activities and key financial policies
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Organizational Development & Compensation Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Organizational Development & Compensation Committee, whose Chair is Dr. Clarke and whose other current members are Mr. Conroy, Dr. Cowen and Mr. De Sole met seven times during 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors has affirmatively determined that each member of the committee is an independent director for purposes of the Organizational Development & Compensation Committee under the applicable SEC regulations, the applicable NYSE rules and the Companys Corporate Governance Guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Organizational Development & Compensation Committee is principally responsible for:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: assisting the independent directors in evaluating the CEOs performance and fixing the CEOs compensation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: making recommendations to the Board with respect to incentive-compensation plans, equity-based plans and director compensation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: reviewing and approving the compensation for executives other than the CEO; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: assisting the Board in management succession planning.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additional information on the Organizational Development & Compensation Committees processes and procedures for the selection of a compensation consultant and consideration and determination of executive and director compensation is addressed below under the caption Executive Compensation Compensation Discussion and Analysis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nominating/Governance Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating/Governance Committee, whose Chair is Mr. Todman and whose other current members are Mr. Conroy and Mr. De Sole met four times during 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors has affirmatively determined that each member of the Nominating/Governance Committee is an independent director within the meaning of the applicable NYSE rules and the Companys Corporate Governance Guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating/Governance Committee is principally responsible for:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: identifying and recommending to the Board of Directors candidates for nomination or appointment as directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: reviewing and recommending to the Board of Directors appointments to Board committees;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: developing and recommending to the Board of Directors corporate governance guidelines for the Company and any changes to those guidelines;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: reviewing, from time to time, the Companys Code of Business Conduct and Ethics and certain other policies and programs intended to promote compliance by the Company with its legal and ethical obligations, and recommending to the Board of Directors any changes to the Companys Code Business Conduct and Ethics and such policies and programs; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: overseeing the Board of Directors annual evaluation of its own performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of the above committees acts under a written charter that is available under the Corporate Governance link under the Investor Relations tab on the Companys website at www.newellbrands.com and may be obtained in print without charge upon written request by any stockholder to the office of the Corporate Secretary of the Company at 221 River Street, Hoboken, New Jersey 07030.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board and Management Roles in Risk Oversight.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management is responsible for the day-to-day management of risk, while the Board of Directors, as a whole and through its committees, provides oversight of the Companys risk management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board engages in risk oversight throughout the year as a matter of course in fulfilling its role overseeing management and business operations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, each year, the full Board receives reports on the strategic plans and related risks facing the Company from senior management, including reports from the Companys individual functions and businesses and their respective management teams.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These risks may nclude financial risks, political and regulatory risks, legal risks, supply chain risks, competitive risks, information technology risks and other risks relevant to the Company and the way it conducts business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has delegated to its committees certain elements of its risk oversight function to better coordinate with management and serve the long-term interests of stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee oversees the Companys risk management process, with specific focus on internal controls, financial statement integrity compliance programs, fraud risk, legal matters
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: and related risk mitigation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In connection with this oversight, the Audit Committee reviews and discusses with management, and, as appropriate, the Companys internal auditors and the Companys registered public accounting firm, the Companys risk assessments, the risk management process and issues related to the management of the Companys business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee also receives an annual enterprise risk management update, which discusses the Companys major financial, strategic, operational and compliance risk exposures and the steps management has taken to monitor and control such exposures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Finance Committee oversees risks relating to the Companys capital structure and financing, including borrowing, liquidity and capital allocation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Finance Committee also oversees risks associated with stockholder distributions (dividends and stock repurchases), the Companys insurance programs, long-term benefit obligations and the use of derivatives to manage risk related to foreign currencies, commodities and interest rates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Organizational Development & Compensation Committee reviews the risk profile of the Companys compensation policies and practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This process includes a review of an assessment of the Companys compensation programs, as described in Risk Assessment of Compensation Programs below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee also manages risks associated with employee retention through employee development and succession planning.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating/Governance Committee monitors risks relating to governance matters and recommends appropriate actions in response to those risks The Nominating/Governance Committee also oversees environmental and health and safety compliance, sustainability, corporate citizenship and government relations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes the allocation of risk management responsibilities described above supplements the Boards leadership structure by allocating risk areas to an appropriate committee for oversight, allows for an orderly escalation of issues as necessary, and helps the Board satisfy its risk oversight responsibilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Risk Assessment of Compensation Programs
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to compensation practices, the Organizational Development & Compensation Committee considered, with the assistance of management and the independent compensation consultant, whether the Companys compensation policies and practices in 2016 for its employees, including the named executive officers, would motivate inappropriate levels of risk taking that could have a material adverse effect on the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Organizational Development & Compensation Committee determined that there was no such material adverse effect.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee noted the following aspects of the executive compensation program that serve to mitigate any potential risk:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The program provides an appropriate balance between cash and equity compensation, fixed and variable compensation, and short-term and long-term compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual bonus payouts are based on a variety of performance metrics.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual bonus payouts and performance-based restricted stock units are capped at 200% of target.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Long-term incentive equity awards are generally subject to a three-year cliff vesting, thus promoting employee development and retentio
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock ownership guidelines link executives interests to increasing the value of the Companys common stock over the long-term, thus aligning managements interest with those of the Companys stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive incentive awards are subject to an incentive recoupment policy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The hedging and pledging of Company securities by executive officers is prohibited.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Nomination Process
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating/Governance Committee is responsible for identifying and recommending to the Board of Directors candidates for directorships.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating/Governance Committee considers candidates for Board membership who are recommended by members of the Nominating/Governance Committee, other Board members, members of management and individual stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Once the Nominating/Governance Committee has identified prospective nominees for director, the Board is responsible for selecting such candidates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board considers candidates for director who are free of conflicts of interest or relationships that may interfere with the performance of their duties.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As set forth in the Corporate Governance Guidelines, the Board seeks to identify as candidates for director a diverse group of persons from various backgrounds and with a variety of life experiences, a reputation for integrity and good business judgment and experience in highly responsible positions in professions or industries relevant to the conduct of the Companys business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In selecting director candidates, the Board takes into account the current composition and diversity of the Board (including diversity with respect to race, gender and ethnicity) and the extent to which a candidates particular expertise and experience will complement the expertise and experience of other directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The director nominees include ten former CEOs or senior executives of large public companies, at least nine of whom have extensive international experience, one African-American, one woman with extensive experience in the investment banking industry and one academic.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors assesses the effectiveness of this policy by conducting an annual review of its own performance discussed below, which evaluates, among other things, whether the Board of Directors and Nominating/Governance Committee are functioning effectively and in compliance with this policy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating/Governance Committee is responsible for organizing and overseeing the review process and for soliciting the input of all of the directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From time to time, the Nominating/Governance Committee has engaged the services of global executive search firms to assist the Nominating/Governance Committee and the Board of Directors in identifying and evaluating potential director candidates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our By-Laws contain certain provisions that address the process (including required information and deadlines) by which a stockholder may nominate an ndividual to stand for election to the Board at the annual meeting of stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Company recently amended its By-Laws to include a proxy access provision.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the amended By-Laws, a stockholder, or a group of up to 20 stockholders, owning 3% or more of the Companys outstanding common stock continuously for at least three years, may nominate and include in the Companys proxy materials director nominees constituting up to 20% of the Board, provided that such stockholder(s) and nominee(s) satisfy the disclosure and other requirements set forth in the amended By-Laws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In order to use this proxy access provision, stockholders are required to hold shares until the date of the applicable annual meeting (but not beyond), and third party compensation arrangements with nominees are permitted if disclosed in advance to the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The full text of the proxy access by-law can be found in Exhibit 3.2 to the Current Report on Form 8-K filed by the Company with the SEC on April 15, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A stockholder who wishes to recommend a director candidate for consideration by the Nominating/Governance Committee should submit such recommendation in writing to the Nominating/Governance Committee at the address set forth below under Communications with the Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A candidate recommended for consideration must be highly qualified and must be willing and able to serve as a director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director candidates recommended by stockholders will receive the same consideration given to other candidates and will be evaluated against the criteria outlined above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Evaluations
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In order to increase the effectiveness of the Board of Directors, the Nominating/Governance Committee supervises an annual review and evaluation of the performance of the Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The evaluation is facilitated by a wide range of questions related to topics including oversight, strategy, management capabilities, structure of the Board of Directors, responsibilities and resources.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Chairperson then reviews the results with the Board of Directors and its committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, each of the Audit, Finance, Nominating/Governance and Organizational Development & Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: committees conducts an annual self-evaluation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From time to time (most recently in 2013), the Board of Directors may also supplement its evaluation processes by using the services of an independent third-party provider to conduct a more comprehensive self and peer evaluation, which includes individual interviews with each director, attendance at a Board meeting as an observer and review of Board materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Communications with the Board of Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The independent members of the Board of Directors have adopted the Companys Procedures for the Processing and Review of Stockholder Communications to the Board of Directors, which provide for the processing, review and disposition of all communications sent by stockholders or other interested persons to the Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders and other interested persons may communicate with the Companys Board of Directors or any member or committee of the Board of Directors by writing to them at the following address:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Newell Brands Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Attention: [Board of Directors]/[Board Member] c/o Corporate Secretary Newell Brands Inc. 221 River Street Hoboken, New Jersey 07030
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Communications directed to the independent or non-management directors should be sent to the attention of the Chairman of the Board or the Chair of the Nominating/Governance Committee, c/o Corporate Secretary, at the address indicated above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any complaint or concern regarding financial statement disclosures, accounting, internal accounting controls, auditing matters or violations of the Companys Code of Ethics for Senior Financial Officers should be sent to the attention of the Chief Legal Officer at the address indicated above or may be submitted in a sealed envelope addressed to the Chair of the Audit Committee, c/o Chief Legal Officer, at the same address, and labeled with a legend such as To Be Opened Only by the Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Such accounting complaints will be processed in accordance with procedures adopted by the Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Further information on reporting allegations relating to accounting matters is available under the Corporate Governance link under the Investor Relations tab on the Companys website at www.newellbrands.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Code of Ethics
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors has adopted a Code of Ethics for Senior Financial Officers, which is applicable to the Companys senior financial officers, ncluding the Companys principal executive officer, principal financial officer, principal accounting officer and controller.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company also has a separate Code of Business Conduct and Ethics that is applicable to all Company employees, including each of the Companys directors and officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Both the Code of Ethics or Senior Financial Officers and the Code of Business Conduct and Ethics are available under the Corporate Governance link under the Investor Relations ab on the Companys website at www.newellbrands.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company posts any amendments to or waivers of its Code of Ethics for Senior Financial Officers or to the Code of Business Conduct and Ethics (to the extent applicable to the Companys directors or executive officers) at the same location on the Companys website.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, copies of the Code of Ethics for Senior Financial Officers and of the Code of Business Conduct and Ethics may be obtained in print without charge upon written request by any stockholder to the office of the Corporate Secretary of the Company at 221 River Street, Hoboken, New Jersey 07030.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: CERTAIN RELATIONSHIPS AND RELATED TRANSACTIONS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Various Newell Brands policies and procedures, which include the Code of Business Conduct and Ethics (applicable to all executive officers and non-employee directors), the Code of Ethics for Senior Financial Officers and annual questionnaires completed by all Newell Brands directors and executive officers, require disclosure of transactions or relationships that may constitute conflicts of interest or otherwise require disclosure under applicable SEC rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to its charter, the Nominating/Governance Committee considers and makes recommendations to the Board of Directors with respect to possible waivers of conflicts of interest or any other provisions of the Code of Business Conduct and Ethics and the Code of Ethics for Senior Financial Officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to the Newell Brands Corporate Governance Guidelines, the Nominating/Governance Committee also annually reviews the continuing independence of Newell Brands non-employee directors under applicable law or NYSE rules and reports its findings to the Board of Directors in connection with its independence determinations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When the Nominating/Governance Committee learns of a transaction or relationship that may constitute a conflict of interest or may cause a director not to be treated as independent, the Nominating/Governance Committee determines if further investigation is required and, if so, whether it should be conducted by Newell Brands legal, internal audit or other staff or by outside advisors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating/Governance Committee reviews and evaluates the transaction or relationship, including the results of any investigation, and makes a recommendation to the Board of Directors with respect to whether a conflict or violation exists or will exist or whether a directors independence is or would be impaired.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors, excluding any director who is the subject of the recommendation, receives the report of the Nominating/Governance Committee and makes the relevant determination.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These practices are flexible and are not required by any document.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the advisory services agreement, Mariposa has agreed, until April 15, 2019, to provide Newell Brands with certain strategic advisory services and such other services relating to Newell Brands and its subsidiaries as may from time to time be mutually agreed to by the parties.

sentences.text: Mariposa is paid an annual fee of $4.0 million for providing such services and has agreed to provide to Newell Brands, upon Newell Brands request, an average of up to 120 hours of such services for each fiscal quarter during the term of the agreement.

sentences.text: During the period of the advisory services agreement, Newell Brands has agreed to cause Newell Brands to provide to Mariposa office space and bear all reasonable costs and expenses of the overhead and support services relating to such office.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, Newell Brands shall reimburse Mariposa for the cost of all reasonable out-of-pocket fees incurred by Mariposa, including the reimbursement for use of private aircraft to attend board meetings of Newell Brands.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In consideration of the benefits to be received by Messrs. Franklin and Ashken under the advisory services agreement (in their capacity as partners in Mariposa), each of Messrs. Franklin and Ashken has agreed to waive all fees and remuneration (but not including reimbursement of certain expenses), to which they otherwise would be entitled to receive in their capacity as directors of Newell Brands during the term of the advisory services agreement.

sentences.text: If the advisory services agreement is terminated without cause (as defined in the advisory services agreement) prior to the third anniversary of the effective time of the subsequent merger, Mariposa will be entitled to receive, within five business days following receipt of written notice of such termination by Newell Brands, an amount equal to $12,000,000 less the sum of all fees paid by Newell Brands under the advisory services agreement to that date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During 2016, Newell Brands made aggregate payments of $3,152,015, including reimbursements of expenses, to Mariposa under the terms of the advisory services agreement.

Hopkins Avenue, Aspen, Colorado 81611, to Mariposa for $2,900,000; and
